page.title: 12FACTORIES IN BIRTLEY
page.content:
There are lots of factories in Birtley. Durham Chemicals test different kinds of chemicals to see what reaction there is to the air. the Brick Works is famous for its bricks. The R.O.F. makes bullets, shells and ammunition. The Marshalling Yard is beside the railway lines and it is used for changing carriages on trains. Birtley Manufacturing makes iron lintels and garage doors.
The Caterpillar used to be one of the biggest factories until it closed down in 1984. It made tractors and building equipment. there are two coal mines near Kibblesworth that are closed down now.
